import React, { Component } from 'react' import ScrollTop from "react-scrolltop-button"; import { SRLWrapper } from "simple-react-lightbox"; // Import SRLWrapper import image1 from '../img/photo1.jpg' import image2 from '../img/photo2.jpg' import image3 from '../img/photo3.jpg' import image4 from '../img/photo4.jpg' import image5 from '../img/photo5.jpg' import image6 from '../img/photo6.jpg' import image7 from '../img/photo7.jpg' import image8 from '../img/photo8.jpg' import image9 from '../img/photo9.jpg' import image10 from '../img/photo10.jpg' import image11 from '../img/photo11.jpg' import SimpleReactLightbox from "simple-react-lightbox"; // Import Simple React Lightbox export default class Images extends Component { componentDidMount(){ document.title="www.luyao-han.online" //define page name } render() { const subSectionStyle={ margin: '0', padding: '0', backgroundColor: '#eb4d4b', backgroundRepeat: 'repeat-y', position: 'relative', height: '75vh', width: '100%', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', fontFamily: 'Raleway, sans-serif', fontStyle: '32px', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '8px' } const bodyStyle={ margin: '0', padding: '0', backgroundColor: '#eb4d4b', backgroundRepeat: 'repeat-y', position: 'relative' } const imageStyle={ position: 'relative', paddingTop:'20px', paddingRight:'20px', top: '1vh', left: '1vw', width:'300px', height:'200px', //zIndex:"1000" } const titleSectionStyle={ margin: '0', padding: '0', backgroundColor: '#eb4d4b', backgroundRepeat: 'repeat-y', height: '20vh', position: 'relative' } const homeTitleStyle={ fontFamily: 'Monoton,cursive', fontSize: '5vw', position: 'relative', top: '1vw', left: '1vw', color: 'white', } const lightboxOptions={ position:'relative', overlayColor: "rgb(25, 136, 124)", captionColor: "#a6cfa5", captionFontFamily: "Raleway, sans-serif", captionFontSize: "22px", captionFontWeight: "300", captionFontStyle: "capitalize", buttonsBackgroundColor: "#1b5245", buttonsIconColor: "rgba(126, 172, 139, 0.8)", zIndex:'-1', enablePanzoom:'true', hideControlsAfter:'true', showCaption:'false', showDownloadButton:'false', }; const scrollTopButtonStyle={ background: 'white', position: 'fixed', bottom: '16px', right: '32px', width: '200px', height: '50px', /*border-radius: 50%;*/ fontSize: '14px', color: '#1f1f1f', textDecoration:'none', transition: 'all .4s' }; return (
Images
Section 1
Section 2
Section 3
) } }
